name: Financial auxiliaries other than management companies, head office of financial corporations, payment institutions
description: Financial auxiliaries subsector (S.126) consists of all financial corporations and quasi-corporations which are principally engaged in activities closely related to financial intermediation but which are not financial intermediaries themselves. This category comprises all other financial auxiliaries such as: central supervisory authorities of financial intermediaries and financial markets when they are separate institutional units; non-profit institutions recognised as independent legal entities serving financial corporations, but not engaged in financial intermediation (see point (d) of paragraph 2.46 of ESA); loan brokers, securities brokers, investment advisers, etc.
